statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email='jane@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND password LIKE '%B';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_role_permissions ON users.role=user_role_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_role_permissions.permission_id=user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password_hash='xxyyzz' AND role='user';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM Roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM RolePermissions JOIN Roles ON RolePermissions.role_id = Roles.role_id WHERE Roles.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON Roles.role_id = UserRoles.role_id WHERE Users.username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY Users.username ASC, Roles.role_name DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Permissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON Roles.role_id = UserRoles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON Permissions.permission_id = RolePermissions.permission_id WHERE UserRoles.role_id = 1;

SELECT DISTINCT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON Roles.role_id = UserRoles.role_id WHERE Roles.role_name IN ('Admin', 'Editor') LIMIT 10;
